thread.title: Oscars: Jimmy Kimmel Zings Trump Almost Immediately | Hollywood Reporter
thread.title_full: Oscars: Jimmy Kimmel Zings Trump Almost Immediately | Hollywood Reporter

author: Ryan Parker
title: Oscars: Jimmy Kimmel Zings Trump Almost Immediately | Hollywood Reporter
text:
President Donald Trump The president is not watching the awards show, according to Sean Spicer. 
It only took a few minutes into the 89th Academy Awards for the Donald Trump bashing to begin. 
"I want to say thank you to President Trump. Remember last year when it seemed like the Oscars were racist? That's gone, thanks to him," said host Jimmy Kimmel. 
A political climate for the evening was expected as numerous celebrities have used awards shows this season to express their concerns and criticisms with the Trump administration. 
Trump is allegedly not going to pay attention to the Oscars as he will be attending the Governors' Ball, White House press secretary Seas Spicer said previously. In years past, Trump has hate-watched the show and tweeted about it. 
Some Republicans and Trump supporters said over social media they would not watch the show because they expected it to be nothing more than Trump bashing. Some of those in that group used the hashtag "#NoOscarsForMe."
